#labels Featured
= Introduction =

_Youtube-upload a simple command-line script to upload videos to youtube.

= Dependencies =

To run youtube-upload you will need:

  * Python (>= 2.5)
  * Python-gdata (>= 1.0.10)

= Download & Install =

  * [http://code.google.com/p/youtube-upload/downloads/list From sources]:

{{{
$ wget http://youtube-upload.googlecode.com/files/youtube-upload-VERSION.tgz
$ tar xvzf youtube-upload-VERSION.tgz
$ cd youtube-upload-VERSION
$ sudo cp youtube-upload/youtube-upload.py /usr/local/bin/youtube-upload
}}}

= Usage examples =

* Upload a video:

youtube-upload email@gmail.com password somefile.flv "Title" "Description" Shows "simpsons, tvshows"
